page.title: 20LEISURE
page.content: There are few facilities in the area for recreation, although a number of beaches and coastal resorts are not too far distant and the nearby town of Barnstaple does offer a Leisure Centre to which many of the local people travel to engage in such pursuits as swimming, bowls, squash or gymnasium activities. One interesting local facility in the village of Shirwell itself is the bowling alley which is inside an old, wooden railway carriage-once part of the rolling stock of the Great Western Railway. In the tourist season, pony treks take place at a local farm.
